title: Admission or establishment of new States.
text: Parliament may by law admit into the Union, or establish, new States on such terms & conditions as it thinks fit.
summary: Art 2 empowers Parl to admit terr.s that were hitherto not part of the Union. Notably, this has perhaps been invoked just once â€” for the admission of Chandernagore into WB in 1954 (other admissions were made via diff CAAs).
